list_definition.definition: (often with behind) to move too slowly and become left behind

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We waited for the smaller children, who were lagging behind the rest.

list_definition.definition: an act of lagging or the amount by which one thing is later than another

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There is sometimes a time lag of several seconds between our seeing the lightning and our hearing the thunder.
